educationItems.description: Comprehensive certification covering security and risk management, asset security, security architecture, network security, identity management, and more.
Professional certification focusing on ethical hacking methodologies, tools, and techniques for identifying and securing vulnerabilities.
Hands-on penetration testing certification demonstrating practical skills in identifying and exploiting vulnerabilities.

educationItems.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
educationItems.description: Specialized in computer security and networks. Senior thesis on "Automated Detection of Advanced Persistent Threats."
